TextBlock.Text: Components: All available gravity crystals from the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop,</color> 1 white hole warp core.
No suitable warp cores found in Black Hole Forge (likely expended during crafting of advanced warp core..) Seeking alternatives..
Update: Suitable white hole warp core obtained from advanced warp core powering <color=orange>Deep Storm Station.</color>
Structure: Gravity crystals to be arranged in compact inward lattice, all surrounding and angled towards white hole warp core, with remaining external crystals used to stabilize flight trajectory.
CASSAVA: The Inspired's construction was completed today.

CASSAVA: Using a lattice of gravity crystals arranged towards its core, the Inspired will exert a constant gravitational force to capture, compact, and pressurize all deadly matter spread across this star system.
CASSAVA: Upon receiving the order, the central warp core will be crushed, and all comprising gravity crystals will exert a maximal force crushing inwards against the released white hole.
CASSAVA: The accumulated pressure will explosively release the captured matter, and deal mass destruction to any star system within blast radius.
CASSAVA: Once I am able to calculate the source of the comet that has stolen my clan, our future, as well as the countless lifeforms that dwelled within this star system...
CASSAVA: I shall deliver to the source of this hostility - my grief, and my fury - a weapon inspired by their own.
